name: SIG u N
description:
This is my entry for the 5 Devs 1 Artpack Youtube Challenge I was invited for. 

SIG u N is a weird Shoot 'em up were every bullet you use cost you a part of your life.

MUSIC BY:  Chippy's Chiptune Music Pack.

https://chippy01302.itch.io/chippy-music-pack

ART BY: KENYY ASSETS

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/rpg-urban-pack

CONTROLS:

W A S D: To move.

Space: To interact/dash

Mouse Left Click: Go Figure it out :).
